code: import{SET_AUTHED_USER,REMOVE_AUTHED_USER}from"../actions/authedUser";export default function authedUser(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:null;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case SET_AUTHED_USER:return action.id;case REMOVE_AUTHED_USER:return null;default:return state;}}
